alert.note: Alert for Corson; Dewey (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 10:56PM MDT until April 22 at 11:45PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Corson County in north central South Dakota... Northeastern Dewey County in north central South Dakota... * Until 1145 PM MDT. * At 1056 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Laplant, or 27 miles northeast of Eagle Butte, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Promise around 1110 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Trail City, Grand River Casino, Indian Memorial Rec Area and Wakpala. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Aberdeen.
